Fred2.EpitopePrediction.PSSM module¶

class Fred2.EpitopePrediction.PSSM.APSSMEpitopePrediction[source]¶

Bases: Fred2.Core.Base.AEpitopePrediction

Abstract base class for PSSM predictions.

Implements predict functionality

predict(peptides, alleles=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Returns predictions for given peptides an alleles. If no alleles are given, predictions for all available models are made.

Parameters:
  • peptides (list(Peptide)/Peptide) – A single Peptide or a list of Peptides
  • alleles (list(Alleles)) – a list of Alleles
  • kwargs – optional parameter (not used yet)
Returns:

Returns a AResult object with the prediction results

class Fred2.EpitopePrediction.SVM.ASVMEpitopePrediction[source]¶

Bases: Fred2.Core.Base.AEpitopePrediction, Fred2.Core.Base.ASVM

implements default prediction routine for SVM based epitope prediction tools

predict(peptides, alleles=None, **kwargs)[source]¶
class Fred2.EpitopePrediction.SVM.SVMHC[source]¶

Bases: Fred2.EpitopePrediction.SVM.ASVMEpitopePrediction

Implements SVMHC epitope prediction for MHC-I alleles (SYFPEITHI models)

Doennes, P. and Kohlbacher, O. SVMHC: a server for prediction of MHC-binding peptides. Nucleic Acids Res, 2006, 34, W194-W197

convert_alleles(alleles)[source]¶
encode(peptides)[source]¶

Here implements a binary sparse encoding of the peptide

Parameters:peptides –
Returns:dict(peptide, (tuple(int, list(tuple(int,float)))) – dictionary with peptide as key and feature encoding as value (see svmlight encoding scheme http://svmlight.joachims.org/)

Feldhahn, M., Toussaint, N. C., Ziehm, M. anf Kohlbacher, O. UniTope - Prediction of MHC Class I Binding Peptides for All MHC Alleles. Submitted to Bioinformatics on 09-22-2007.
